Most of the Destrons are in a bunkder JP. You should read the posts. And wh=
at Destron conversation were you monitering? Surly not the one where the CO=
MMS WEREN'T BEING USED.

::Dachande::

    He slipped into his CLOAKED mode=
, where in nobody could see him, hear him, or sense him. He had upgraded it=
. There was no way for anybody to locae him unless he shot his weapons, the=
n they would be able to see where the shot came from.
    He left the bunke=
r under full cloak. He had no communications up, so that there was no way t=
o find him. He got all his weapons ready and headed off to hunt down NDecpt=
icon members.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: JP3884@... 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, February 25, 2001 5:21 PM
  Subjec=
t: Re: Destrons-Darkefate


       Tarantulas was picking up the Destron co=
mmunication, although it was 
  filled with static and noise. He worked on =
it a little until Hell Beast 
  approached. "Its a classic Destron trick Ta=
rantulas. They want to get into 
  the base by blowing open the shields. Co=
unter that attack with these." 
        In his large aged hands laid a smoo=
th black plate about a foot in 
  circumfrence. The device, with the bright=
 Predacon/Decepticon insignia of the 
  Neo Decepticon Empire on it, was bu=
ilt to release a mini force feild in a 
  distance of 10 feet. These plates=
, when laid around the shield perimiter, 
  would almost double the strengt=
h of the shields and undoubtedly stop the   
  Destron operation currently =
in progress. With the Autoguns, Missle turrets, 
  the EMP canon, four manu=
le defense canons, and a hull so thick that a 
  titanium missle couldnt bl=
ow through it, Hell Beast was strategically sound. 
        Tarantulas pick=
ed up the device, and with Black Aracnia, Klash, and 
  Quickstrike they we=
nt to a cargo hold. There they found the plates and began 
  to spread them=
 over the shield perimiter. 
        Hell Beast drew his chain gun and load=
ed it. After replacing it he did 
  it to several other weapons in the weap=
ons locker. The assortment of fire 
  arms the Ramora contained was absolut=
ely devilish. At the bridge he watched 
  his troops, confident in thier ac=
tions. 

        Craken and Bezerker, carrying the damaged and almost dead =
Nighteyes 
  quckly returned to the Ramora quickly. The mech fluid from the=
 bots peeled 
  off of them. Craken, carrying the other two, entered the Ra=
mora via a top 
  most zone of the shield dropped and quickly activated agi=
an.

vice.
